programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe
programme.desc: Market reports from London and overnight news from Wall Street - markets never sleep, and neither does Bloomberg News. Track investments 24 hours a day from around the world.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Europe
programme.desc: Anchored by Anna Edwards and Mark Cudmore, a fast-paced show of news and analysis, building towards the drama and excitement of the start of trading across the Continent.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: European Open
programme.desc: Kick-start the trading day with Francine Lacqua and Tom Mackenzie from London bringing you news that no investor in Europe can afford to miss.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance: Early Edition
programme.desc: With Francine Lacqua from London, bringing insight on global markets and the top business stories of the day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance: Early Edition
programme.desc: With Anna Edwards, Matt Miller, and Kailey Leinz from London, Berlin and New York, bringing insight on markets and the top stories of the day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
programme.desc: With Tom Keene, Jonathan Ferro, and Lisa Abramowicz from New York, bringing insight on global markets and the top business stories of the day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: The Open
programme.desc: Jonathan Ferro hosts this programme showcasing the most insightful and informative Bloomberg charts to help position a global audience for the trading day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: Americas
programme.desc: Find out all the latest and most important markets news and business trends from Western hemisphere. The programme is hosted by Vonnie Quinn, with the help from various other hosts, and it airs live from New York City.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: European Close
programme.desc: Analysing the major market moving stories across the day in Europe, hearing from the biggest newsmakers, and showcasing the unrivalled expertise of Bloomberg News.

programme.title: Bloomberg Balance of Power
programme.desc: Informational programme covering stories about worldwide politics, business and everything in between. The journalists report on the top news stories from these two fields, and interview experts who share their thoughts on a wide range of relevant topics.

programme.title: Bloomberg Real Yield
programme.desc: Focusing on global issues and events that directly affect debt markets. Host Jonathan Ferro discusses stories from the fixed income world with the biggest names in the field.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets
programme.desc: Bloomberg Markets is focused on bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

programme.title: Bloomberg Technology
programme.desc: The only daily news programme focused exclusively on technology, innovation and the future of business. Hosted by Ed Ludlow from San Francisco and Caroline Hyde in New York.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets: The Close
programme.desc: Romaine Bostick breaks down the day's top stories and trading action leading into the close.

programme.title: Bloomberg Technology
programme.desc: The only daily news programme focused exclusively on technology, innovation and the future of business. Hosted by Ed Ludlow from San Francisco and Caroline Hyde in New York.

programme.title: Bloomberg Wall Street Week
programme.desc: David Westin speaks with top names in finance about the week's biggest issues on Wall Street.

programme.title: Idea Generation
programme.desc: Ideas are the global currency of the 21st century. But how do you come up with, execute, and operationalise one? The answers are what separates successful creative influences from everyone else.

programme.title: Emma Barnett Meets...
programme.desc: In a series of one to one interviews award-winning journalist Emma Barnett meets leaders in their fields who are advancing and reshaping the global debate.

programme.title: Crypto IRL
programme.desc: Tim Stenovic and Katie Greifeld make sense of the crypto world. From utility to energy to NFTs, from web3 to crime, this series is relaxed, conversational, accessible and full of insight.

programme.title: The David Rubenstein Show
programme.desc: Follow financier and philanthropist David Rubenstein as he travels around the US to interview some notable people, his peers, in order to find out what makes them such good leaders and so successful. He will talk to some of the most influential people in business and politics, hearing their life stories and how they became people thay are today.

programme.title: Bloomberg Chief Future Officer
programme.desc: Chief Financial Officers now play a critical role in shaping corporate strategy and positioning organisations to meet future challenges - this programme profiles them.

programme.desc: David Westin speaks with top names in finance about the week's biggest issues on Wall Street.

programme.title: Bloomberg Front Row
programme.desc: Providing key news and information through in-depth analysis along with exclusive interviews with some of the most influential names in finance.
